about_the_game:
Uptempo, fun, energetic, bring some life and party energy to your games! This versatile music pack contains lots of variety for your various scenes, from ultra-modern EDM and electronica music to urban chill vibes, acoustic guitar funky grooves, with a couple modern electronica tracks featuring repetitive gang vocals to get you pumped up... plus much more!

Features:

* 22 songs in .m4a, .ogg, .mp3 and .wav formats
* Music for road trips, modern urban settings, gentle evenings, and futuristic battles!
* Royalty-free music for use in RPG Maker MV or the engine of your choice!

Tracklist:

Acoustic:

Road Movie
Morning
Smoky Piano
Funny Day
Sunset

EDM:

Super Girl
Run With Wind
Office Time Dance
Metro Line
Fly High
Time Limiter
Sister

Lofi:

Bedroom
Sleep
Dreamy
Gently Weeps

Soft:

Clock
Noize
Gossip
Trip Night

Vox:

Warrior
Get Up
